conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: walls have height and thickness, multiple wall faces are visible, interior volume is readable, and the view is angled/isometric with the ceiling removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion of walls with consistent thickness; floors read as separate planes; corners are properly modeled. Cutaway is clean and the elevated angled view exposes interior well; minor simplification in some junctions/openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall arrangement does not closely match the 2D plan segment: several labeled spaces in 2D (e.g., WC, utility/HVAC zone, pantry/breakfast niche/window seat geometry) are not clearly represented or appear merged/relocated. Some internal partitions and room proportions differ from the 2D drawing.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen and dining furniture are present (cabinets, island, table/chairs). However, bathroom fixtures corresponding to the 2D WC are not shown, and some rooms are left as empty blocks with ambiguous function.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good separation of walls/floors and readable openings; lighting and materials are consistent and do not obscure geometry. Background is clean with no text/UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: Layout fidelity mismatch: room configuration/adjacencies in the 3D model do not clearly correspond to the 2D plan (multiple 2D spaces appear missing, merged, or rearranged).
Door/window placement and opening count/orientation are not verifiably aligned with the 2D plan (openings appear simplified and not clearly on the same walls).
Furniture/fixtures do not cover key rooms indicated in 2D (notably WC/bath fixtures), reducing room identity confirmation.

summary: True 3D cutaway with solid modeling quality, but the generated 3D layout only loosely matches the 2D plan’s room configuration and openings.
